titles: The Earl of Manchesters speech to his Majesty in the name of the peers, at his arrival at White-Hall, the 29th of May, 1660. With his Majesties gracious answer thereunto.
author: Manchester, Edward Montagu, Earl of, 1602-1671.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Re-printed by Christopher Higgins, in Harts Close, over against the Trone-Church,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letters.
Text of "His Majesties gracious answer" in black letter.
Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
With: His Majesties gracious answer to the Earle of Manchesters speech.
